Author: Neeraj Kumar Jain
Review Text: It's a very good campus.They have more than 8 classrooms with capacity of 40-50 students each.Experienced faculty members and very good study material which shows 36 years' effort and dedication of team Allen.They prepare students for NEET and JEE exams.They also have foundation batches for students from class 8th to 10th CBSE and ICSE boards.There is separate space for self study for students.They have dedicated doubt solving counters everyday after classes.

Author: DEEPAK
Review Text: I am a student if Allen in starting I was not aware but i join Allen because my father was saying to try 1 year and the facultys are the best teachers

Author: Yashaa Mishra
Review Text: ALLEN Career Institute, PANVEL is a top-notch coaching center for students from 6th to 12th standard for entire syllabus in CBSE/ICSE board schools. Their skillful and supportive teachers with the comprehensive curriculum make it an excellent choice for IIT-JEE, NEET, and Olympiad preparation. This institute provides with large classrooms and comfortable environment for students to learn and self study. The institute also has a  commendable track record of students achieving top ranks in competitive exams.  Overall, Allen focuses on development and ensures students are well-prepared for their academic journey.

Author: Rupa Thakur
Review Text: It's the best place for education and for competition. If someone want to take admission from 8th STD to 12th please persue and remember to take Counselling first before taking admission. And also one can go to take admission for competition exams like olympiads, KVPY, NEET, JEE (MAINS+ ADVANCED) .... So from my side its good and go for it#👍👍

Author: Rani GHANWAT
Review Text: One of the best faculty and curriculumEach student gets personalised attention. Teacher helps in development of thinking ability . One of the best institute that I can recommend.

Author: SITARAM ANJANEYULU DALIPARTHI
Review Text: The overall experience in ALLEN Spectra workshop was nice. We had many fun activities, learnt many new things.

Author: Rajinder Kaur
Review Text: Best Coaching for the students from class 6th to 12th (IIT-JEE/NEET) in Panvel.Covering CBSE/ICSE course curriculum with outmost attention to child to improve in academic along with Olympiad preparation for National and International level.Student's are groomed in non-academic activities related to Maths and Science with fun Workshops.

Author: Anamika Dubey
Review Text: Best institute, personal attention to students. Supportive , Experienced teachers and supportive staff .
